verses.verse: וּבִשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁמֹנֶ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֔ה <S%H6240><s%> teen לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king יָרָבְעָ֣ם <S%H3379><s%> Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָ֑ט <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אֲבִיָּ֖ם <S%H38><s%> Abijam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> over Judah

שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> Three שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> he in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's מַעֲכָ֖ה <S%H4601><s%> [was] Maachah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אֲבִישָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H53><s%> of Abishalom

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטֹּ֥אות <S%H2403><s%> in all the sins אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> of his father אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> which he had done לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְבָב֤וֹ <S%H3824><s%> him and his heart שָׁלֵם֙ <S%H8003><s%> was not perfect עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> with the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> his God כִּלְבַ֖ב <S%H3824><s%> as the heart דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> Nevertheless for David's נָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> give יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> sake did the LORD אֱלֹהָ֥יו <S%H430><s%> his God ל֛וֹ נִ֖יר <S%H5216><s%> him a lamp בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem לְהָקִ֤ים <S%H6965><s%> to set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> after וּֽלְהַעֲמִ֖יד <S%H5975><s%> him and to establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> because עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> did דָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> Because David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not סָ֞ר <S%H5493><s%> and turned not aside מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> because צִוָּ֗הוּ <S%H6680><s%> from any [thing] that he commanded כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> him all the days חַיָּ֔יו <S%H2416><s%> of his life רַ֕ק <S%H7535><s%> in בִּדְבַ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> save only in the matter אוּרִיָּ֥ה <S%H223><s%> of Uriah הַחִתִּֽי׃ <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite

וּמִלְחָמָ֨ה <S%H4421><s%> And there was war הָיְתָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become בֵין־ <S%H996><s%> between רְחַבְעָ֛ם <S%H7346><s%> between Rehoboam וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> and Jeroboam כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <S%H2416><s%> of his life

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts אֲבִיָּם֙ <S%H38><s%> of Abijam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and all that he did הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וּמִלְחָמָ֥ה <S%H4421><s%> battle הָיְתָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between אֲבִיָּ֖ם <S%H38><s%> between Abijam וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יָרָבְעָֽם׃ <S%H3379><s%> and Jeroboam

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept אֲבִיָּם֙ <S%H38><s%> And Abijam עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <S%H6912><s%> and they buried אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> him in the city דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אָסָ֥א <S%H609><s%> and Asa בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ

וּבִשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> And in the twentieth לְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> Asa מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> over Judah

וְאַרְבָּעִ֤ים <S%H705><s%> And forty וְאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> and one שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> he in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's מַעֲכָ֖ה <S%H4601><s%> [was] Maachah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אֲבִישָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H53><s%> of Abishalom

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did אָסָ֛א <S%H609><s%> And Asa הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> as [did] David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וַיַּעֲבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> And he took away הַקְּדֵשִׁ֖ים <S%H6945><s%> the sodomites מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land וַיָּ֙סַר֙ <S%H5493><s%> and removed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגִּלֻּלִ֔ים <S%H1544><s%> all the idols אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> had made אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> that his fathers

וְגַ֣ם ׀ <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲכָ֣ה <S%H4601><s%> And also Maachah אִמּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> his mother וַיְסִרֶ֙הָ֙ <S%H5493><s%> even her he removed מִגְּבִירָ֔ה <S%H1377><s%> from [being] queen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> because עָשְׂתָ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> because she had made מִפְלֶ֖צֶת <S%H4656><s%> an idol לָאֲשֵׁרָ֑ה <S%H842><s%> in a grove וַיִּכְרֹ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> destroyed אָסָא֙ <S%H609><s%> and Asa אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִפְלַצְתָּ֔הּ <S%H4656><s%> her idol וַיִּשְׂרֹ֖ף <S%H8313><s%> and burnt בְּנַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> [it] by the brook קִדְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H6939><s%> Kidron

וְהַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> But the high places לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not סָ֑רוּ <S%H5493><s%> were not removed רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but לְבַב־ <S%H3824><s%> heart אָסָ֗א <S%H609><s%> nevertheless Asa's הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁלֵ֛ם <S%H8003><s%> was perfect עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יָמָֽיו׃ <S%H3117><s%> all his days

וַיָּבֵא֙ <S%H935><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H6944><s%> had dedicated אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> which his father [וְקָדְשֹׁו כ] (וְקָדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H6944><s%> the dedicated ק) בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold וְכֵלִֽים׃ <S%H3627><s%> and vessels

וּמִלְחָמָ֨ה <S%H4421><s%> And there was war הָיְתָ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between אָסָ֗א <S%H609><s%> between Asa וּבֵ֛ין <S%H996><s%> between בַּעְשָׁ֥א <S%H1201><s%> and Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3117><s%> all their days

וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up בַּעְשָׁ֤א <S%H1201><s%> And Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> against Judah וַיִּ֖בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> Ramah לְבִלְתִּ֗י <S%H1115><s%> not תֵּ֚ת <S%H5414><s%> that he might not suffer יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> any to go out וָבָ֔א <S%H935><s%> or come in לְאָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> to Asa מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took אָ֠סָא <S%H609><s%> Then Asa אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכֶּ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> all the silver וְהַזָּהָ֜ב <S%H2091><s%> and the gold הַֽנּוֹתָרִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3498><s%> [that were] left בְּאוֹצְר֣וֹת <S%H214><s%> in the treasures בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֽוֹצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house [מֶלֶךְ כ] (הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and King ק) וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand עֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֞ם <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's אָסָ֗א <S%H609><s%> Asa אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֶּן־ הֲ֠דַד <S%H1130><s%> them to Benhadad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son טַבְרִמֹּ֤ן <S%H2886><s%> of Tabrimon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֶזְיוֹן֙ <S%H2383><s%> of Hezion מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and king אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria הַיֹּשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> at Damascus לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

בְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> [There is] a league בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵינֶ֔ךָ <S%H996><s%> and me between בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> and me between אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> between me and thee [and] between my father וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> and me between אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> and thy father הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָׁלַ֨חְתִּֽי <S%H7971><s%> behold I have sent לְךָ֥ שֹׁ֙חַד֙ <S%H7810><s%> unto thee a present כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְזָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go הָפֵ֗רָה <S%H6565><s%> and break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִֽיתְךָ֙ <S%H1285><s%> thy league אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with בַּעְשָׁ֣א <S%H1201><s%> with Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> that he may depart מֵעָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened בֶּן־ הֲדַ֜ד <S%H1130><s%> So Benhadad אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king אָסָ֗א <S%H609><s%> Asa וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <S%H7971><s%> and sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> the captains הַחֲיָלִ֤ים <S%H2428><s%> of the hosts אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לוֹ֙ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> which he had against the cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִיּ֣וֹן <S%H5859><s%> Ijon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> and Dan וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אָבֵ֣ל בֵּֽית־ מַעֲכָ֑ה <S%H62><s%> and Abelbethmaachah וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כִּנְר֔וֹת <S%H3672><s%> and all Cinneroth עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> besides כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> with all the land נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard בַּעְשָׁ֔א <S%H1201><s%> And it came to pass when Baasha וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <S%H2308><s%> [thereof] that he left off מִבְּנ֖וֹת <S%H1129><s%> building אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> of Ramah וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בְּתִרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> in Tirzah
